√yu1 'unite'

present: [2.] yaúti  yuvati etc.  yuté  yuvate etc.   -- [6.] yuváti  yuváte etc.   -- [9.] yunāti  yunīte  

perfect: yuyāva  yuyuvé  

aorist: [1.] yūyāt  ayāvi   -- [3.] ayīyavat   -- [5.] yā́viṣṭam?  ayaviṣṭa  

future: [1.] yaviṣyati  yaviṣyate   -- [2.] yuvitā́  yavitā  

verbal: yutá V.+  -yū́ya V.+  -yutya  

secondary: passive: yūyate   -- intensive: yóyuvat  yóyuve etc.   -- desiderative: yúyūṣati  yiyaviṣa-   -- causative: yāvayati  yivāvayiṣati  

derivatives: yú B.+  -yava RV.  yávana AV.+  -yuvana S.+  -yut V.B.  yuti C.  -yūti? V.+  yotra E.  yūthá? V.+  yūna S.  yóni? V.+  yúvan? V.+  yáviṣṭha V.+  yavīyas S.+  yós? V.+  yóṣaṇā etc. V.+  -yāva E.+  -yāvana C.  yāvayitṛ C.  

Compare √yuj and √2yu; from the latter, in combination with prefixes, the forms and derivatives of this root are not always separable with certainty.
